title: Rohit Shetty house firing: 7 lured with quick money for ‘mission’ by ‘Hindu Sainiks’, say cops
description: Investigations reveal the Shubham Lonkar gang used social media and local contacts to recruit shooters for the firing outside Rohit Shetty's home. Youths were promised money, fame, and identity. The main shooter received an advance payment. Police arrested seven more individuals, identifying two modules involved in the operation. Financial details are under verification as accused statements vary.

title: Ouch, my joints! Why your 20s and 30s are no longer immune to joint pain
description: Joint pain is no longer exclusive to older adults; young people in their 20s and 30s are increasingly experiencing it. Sedentary lifestyles, poor posture, and ignoring early warning signs like stiffness or pain after exercise contribute to this trend. Experts urge prompt medical evaluation to prevent permanent damage and emphasize proper exercise and body awareness.

title: 5% reservation for Muslims scrapped in Maharashtra
description: Maharashtra's Social Justice Department has revoked the 5% reservation previously granted to certain Muslim communities under the SEBC category. This decision, based on court rulings and existing legal frameworks concerning the 2014 policy, impacts admissions to educational institutions and government job recruitments. The earlier order has now been officially cancelled.

title: 'No threat but vigilance is necessary': RSS chief renews 'united Hindus' pitch; backs 3-child policy

A committee will now develop guidelines to foster sensitivity in judges.
